movie.title: Deepwater Horizon
movie.plot: A story set on the offshore drilling rig Deepwater Horizon, which exploded during April 2010 and created the worst oil spill in U.S. history.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 13 nominations.
